references.paper_title: Benchmarking materials property prediction methods: the matbench test set and automatminer reference algorithm
references.reason: This paper provides a standardized benchmark dataset and algorithm for evaluating materials property prediction methods, crucial for assessing the performance of machine learning models in the field.

references.paper_title: An invertible crystallographic representation for general inverse design of inorganic crystals with targeted properties
references.reason: This paper introduces an invertible crystallographic representation and utilizes it for the inverse design of inorganic crystals, which is directly relevant to the method proposed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: High-throughput discovery of novel cubic crystal materials using deep generative neural networks
references.reason: This work applies deep generative neural networks to the high-throughput discovery of cubic crystal materials, demonstrating the effectiveness of deep learning in materials discovery.

references.paper_title: Physics guided deep learning for generative design of crystal materials with symmetry constraints
references.reason: This study combines physics-guided deep learning with symmetry constraints for crystal structure generation, offering a more accurate and efficient approach to material discovery.

references.paper_title: Scaling deep learning for materials discovery
references.reason: This paper explores the scalability of deep learning methods for materials discovery, addressing challenges and outlining potential advancements in the field.
